question: MS Ravi, who passed away recently, was the veteran personality from which field?
explanation: MS Ravi (68), the Chief Editor of leading Malayalam daily \"Kerala Kaumadi\", has passed away in Thiruvananthapuram on April 20, 2018. He was the fourth son of Kerala Kaumudi founder editor K. Sukumaran and Madhavi Sukumaran. Mr. Ravi was an energetic presence in the Stateâ€™s social and cultural circuit & was also a recipient of several awards.
